meanings.definition: A device used to make a substance uniform in consistency.
meanings.sent1: The homogenizer mixed the ingredients perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician used the homogenizer to blend the solution.
meanings.sent3: The homogenizer decided to throw a party for all the different liquids in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a homogenizer, smoothing out all the wrinkles of worry.
meanings.sent5: With a loud hum, the homogenizer transformed the lumpy mixture into a smooth paste.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that homogenizes.
meanings.sent1: The chef was a skilled homogenizer in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The new machine proved to be an efficient homogenizer of opinions.
meanings.sent3: The homogenizer robot was programmed to make everyone dance the same way.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as a homogenizer, bringing together conflicting ideas.
meanings.sent5: The teacher was like a homogenizer, ensuring all students understood the lesson equally.
